attributes.action: Change the Kit Kat wrapper back to foil and paper! please
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the Kit Kat wapper should be changed back to the foil and paper. The paper cn be recycled and the foil is really cool. The plastic is wasting the earths natural resources and we should be conserving them not wasting them on sweets. ( although Kit Kats are nice). Bring back the old Kit Kat wrapper is the olny one for us!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
